item.title: 从Youtube下载中国音乐 Download Chinese Music From Youtube
item.description: 怎么下载中国音乐 How to download some good quality Chinese songs or mixes from youtube and learn some info about media formats while at it. Oh and by the way welcome to August 2018 :-)
